metadata.basedOn: Phase 1 analysis - top repeated sentence openers

results_vary_opener.originalPattern: Results vary by creator and plan

What you achieve depends on your situation
Your results may differ from others
Outcomes are influenced by various elements
What you get out of it depends on what you put in
Success varies from person to person
Individual outcomes are different for everyone
Results hinge on personal effort and circumstances
Experiences are shaped by individual choices
Results depend on how you apply what's offered
What you experience depends on your engagement
Your outcome is tied to your specific situation
Results are not uniform across all users
Individual factors influence what you achieve
Experiences differ based on personal application
